author: kfogel
msg: Ululate in Greg Stein's general direction:
svn_wc_get_wc_prop.  Did you have to read that twice?  Good.  I had

author: kfogel
msg: Divide svn_cstring_split into two interfaces, as suggested by Greg
(svn_cstring_split): Return to pre-revision-1993 prototype, but now
implement by wrapping a call to svn_cstring_split_append.
(add_ignore_patterns): Take an apr_array_header_t again, not a
pointer to an apr_array_header_t.  Call svn_cstring_split_append
(add_unversioned_items): Remove extra level of indirection in call

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix svnadmin_tests after the filesystem changes.  This leaves only one
failing tests (a single fs-test) in the whole suite!
(create_txn, remove_txn): Increment txn ids used in tests by 1,
since we actually consume txn ids `0' and `1' during the test
setup phase (under the new NodeRevId schema).
